Q: Why doesn't Call Recorder record calls or randomly record calls?

 Android 6.0 and later versions have a Battery Optimization function. To decrease battery consumption system can add the CallRecorder into the deactivated state and it looks like app records randomly or does not record any calls.

The problem can be resolved by changing Battery Optimization related settings in your phone. The location of the Settings depends on the phone Model: Common Android phones:

Go to Phone Settings > Battery > Battery Optimization screen, set Call Recorder to “Not Optimized”.
 Huawei phones it can be:

Go to Phone Settings > Power Saving > Protected Apps screen, set Call Recorder to “Protected App”.
 or Go to Phone Settings > Phone Manager > Protected Apps screen, set Call Recorder to “Protected App”.
 or Go to Phone Settings > Apps > Advanced > Ignore Optimizations screen, set Call Recorder to “Ignore Optimizations”.
 HTC phones:

Go to Phone Settings > Power > Battery Optimization screen, set Call Recorder to “Don\’t Optimize”.
 Samsung phones:

Go to Phone Settings > Smart Manager > Battery > App Optimization > Detail screen, set Call Recorder to “Disabled”.
 Also some third-party apps are very powerful that can prevent other apps working, such as Clean Master, App Manager, Task Manager, Battery Optimizer, Greenify, Privacy Guard, etc. These apps prevent Call Recorder working, as a result some of your calls will not be recorded. Please don’t allow them block Call Recorder doing it’s job, usually you need to add Call Recorder into their “White List” or uninstall.

 Q: Why doesn't Call Recorder record long calls?

 It is usually happened for the devices with low RAM memory where the Android system kills recording service because of not enough memory.

Go to the app Settings -> Notifications and enable -> Recording notification (show notification during recording) = ON


Recording service now should not be killed by the system.
The other reason can be not enough storage memory in the phone.

 Q: Where are the recordings saved?

 Although, You can select the directory from the Settings screen.A directory named CallRecorder will be created in that directory which will contain all your recordings. By default, the recordings are stored in SD card in the directory CallRecorder.


Q: " " I lost my phone" " or " "Phone had a factory reset" " or " "I deleted some recordings" ". Is it possible to restore the recordings?

 You can restore the recordings to cloud.Please buy Pro version to upload recordings to cloud. 

 Q: How to Enable/Disable Pin Lock?

 Please go to Settings -> Pin Lock 

 From the switch you can Enable/Disable Pin Lock.

Please remove any other call recording apps and apply setting from the setting option.Apply setting to change various audio source. If default option does not work choose speaker option which guarantees your call record.
Some phones don\'t support call recording regardless the setting you apply.But you can still choose speaker with mic option to record call.
